post.description: Greatday API uses access token generated from user ID and user secret for authentication. To get the user ID and user secret, please ask our team. All API calls need the access token to authorize users. Access tokens are expiring in 24 hours by default and can be generated using refresh token.

400.description: Bad request, invalid parameters or JSON body

post.description: Refresh token is used to generate new access token once the access token was expired. The refresh token expired in 1 week.

400.description: Bad request, invalid parameters or JSON body

info.title: Greatday API
info.description: Enables other services to be integrated with Greatday HR

limit.description: Limit the number of data each page (Max. 100)

empStatus.description: Only Show Active or Inactive Employee (Optional). Value: `active`, `inactive`, `all`. By default will return all employee

costCenter.description: Cost Center, using Cost Center Code

status.description: Employment Status, using Employment Status Code

workLocation.description: Work Location, using Work Location Code

maritalStatus.description: Marital Status, 0 = Single, 1 = Married, 2 = Widow, 3 = Widower

timezoneId.description: Timezone ID, see timezone master data

allowCreateNewMaster.description: Greatday will automatically added new master if master data not found in Greatday

transactionEffectiveDate.description: Effective Date of the updated data, required for any kind of Transaction Type except Personal Update

initialJoinDate.description: Join date of the employee, if there`s any change

allowCreateNewMaster.description: Greatday will automatically added new master if master data not found in Greatday
